StarterCard - Class in IS24_LB11.game.components
Represents a starter card in the game, extending the functionality of a normal card with additional central suits and back corners.
StarterCard(String) - Constructor for class IS24_LB11.game.components.StarterCard
Construct a StarterCard from the information encoded in the given String with the following syntax: char 0-6 : same syntax followed by NormalCard char 7-9 : represents the suits found in the center of the card.
